entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of rain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
